# drawpad
Very simple drawing program.
![Demo] (https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/44080259/515695227-5e6710a5-95ce-4f98-a880-9d7a17f541e1.mp4?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Ldmz1ZbsdtvW1ZgsYUzZW9nw4uBfjWxmcHn0ytjt4IE)

## Getting Started
### Dependencies
* gcc
* SDL 2.0
* other stuff
### Building & Running
```
gcc -o drawpad *.c `pkg-config --cflags --libs sdl2`
```
```
./drawpad
```
